#summary Custom ELSA Parsers

= Where do I put my custom ELSA parsers? =
Create a new subdirectory in /etc/elsa/patterns.d/, add your parsers to the new subdirectory, and then use pdbtool to merge the entire /etc/elsa/patterns.d/ directory into /opt/elsa/node/conf/patterndb.xml.  For example:
{{{
# Become root
sudo -i

# Create a new subdirectory in /etc/elsa/patterns.d/
mkdir /etc/elsa/patterns.d/local/

# Add file(s) to your new subdirectory containing your new parsers
vi /etc/elsa/patterns.d/local/my_new_log_parser_1
vi /etc/elsa/patterns.d/local/my_new_log_parser_2

# Merge with pdbtool
PATTERNS_DIR=/etc/elsa/patterns.d/
DEST_PATTERN=/opt/elsa/node/conf/patterndb.xml
cp $DEST_PATTERN $DEST_PATTERN.bak
pdbtool merge -p $DEST_PATTERN --recursive -D $PATTERNS_DIR
}}}
